Es un Juego muy divertido, en especial si lo compartes con amigos y disfrutas de las oleadas en los distintos mapas que te ofrece Killing Floor,pero cuándo eres el ultimo ante el patriarch, la tensión puede crecer y más aun si no tienes chaleco antibalas y excasa munición, Consejo: No confies mucho en los medicos, algunos te dejan morir y son cero aporte, cuidado con encerrarte en espacios pequeños, ya que te condenas solo y en la ronda final ante el patriarch, tal vez, veas gente tonta que se explota con sus mismas c4, esa gente no entiende y son rica carne de cañon c:

Nagyon jó most hogy le volt árazva megvettem és nem bántam meg

Este foi sem dúvidas um dos jogos mais viciantes de FPS que já joguei!


Killing Floor é um jogo de tiro cooperativo de sobrevivência que coloca você e mais cinco outros jogadores contra onda após onda de "espécimes" humanóides geneticamente modificados que escaparam do laboratório e estão rapidamente invadindo a Inglaterra. 

O jogo conta com um ambiente nostálgico a la Resident Evil 1 do PSX e com uma trilha sonora fodástica. 

Vale mencionar o sistema de pontuações de evolução de personagem e upgrade de armas. O jogo é estilo Left 4 Dead, porém conta com espadas, facas e também algumas armas insanas. Vale muuuuito a pena. 

Para um jogo antigo, não será problema encontrar servidores.

Ahhh, também tenho um servidor que fica lá online direto, compra o jogo e cola lá: nome do server, BRASIL BR!
IDK how this game waste a lot of my time
Just don't get surrounded. This isn't like L4D where you can just knock them back, lol.

The game is awesome. I already played a great amount of hours into the game. This game has diverse maps to play on. The enemy set is the same throughout the game except for the boss. And the game has different game modes. This allows for a variety of ways different games play each time. This a great buy for me!

Still an entertaining game after all these years. The fact that you must learn how to cooperate with other players in order to survive a wave (in later levels) against multiple enemies and keeping yourself and others alive is not something you get to see everyday. Great game to buy for a bunch of friends who wanto to try out this kind of games (shooter-survival), and then maybe jump into the sequel if needed. Still, some time must be invested to level up a perk up to level 6, but this was another formula (if you look at leveling in KF2).

Somehow this game got everything right.  It was the first game I bought when I joined the Steam platform and it's the game I've got the most hours in.  Even after nearly a decade I still go back to it time and time again.  I find it superior in every way to its sequel except for the graphics engine.  The maps are so atmospheric and amazing.  It perfectly captures the look, feel, sound and tension of horror movies.  Good ones, not modern CGI garbage.  Now that there's a new shiny Killing Floor 2 I think the clunky old interface and lesser graphics (which still look great to me) add to the creepiness of the experience.
This is a godly classic fell in love the momment i played it

This game is still better than the second one. The maps are bigger, balance of perks and character progression is better, characters are more fitting the atmosphere of the game and overall it is much more fun to play and never gets old.
